text: Hey guys, I just wanted to throw up a little plug for the Gala my choir company is putting on tomorrow. <https://www.facebook.com/events/448505868644994/>  There will be a silent auction with things like Blazers tickets, Restaurant gift certificates, Massage gift certificates and trips; as well as free food and a paid bar. Of course the real highlight will be my groups singing from 7:45 to 8:05, but the event goes from 4:30 to 9 and all proceeds go to a good cause!
